text: Vahe'mo'za havizama huramantesagetma, nona hutma haviza huozamanteho. Kema huhavizama huramantesageta, nona hutma kea huhavizana huozmanteta, tamagra Anumzamofo antahigenkeno asomu huzmanteno, Anumzamo'ma tamagima hu'neana, e'inahu hanazegu tamagi hu'neankitma, asomura tamagra erisanti haregahaze.
